summary: Ellen McNulty loses her hamburger joint and goes to see her son, who marries a socialite at the same time. Due to her modest background and a case of mistaken identity, Ellen poses as the newlyweds' cook.
cast: Gene Tierney|John Lund|Miriam Hopkins|Thelma Ritter|Jan Sterling|Larry Keating|James Lorimer|Gladys Hurlbut|Cora Witherspoon|Malcolm Keen|Ellen Corby|Billie Bird|Mary Young|Samuel Colt|Grayce Hampton|William H. Welsh|William Fawcett|Carol Coombs|Jean Acker|Gordon Arnold|Sam Ash|Tex Brodus|John Bryant|Beulah Christian|James Conaty|Willa Pearl Curtis|Charles Dayton|Martin Eric|Franklyn Farnum|Margaret Farrell|Elizabeth Flournoy|Bess Flowers|Mary Jane French|James Gonzalez|Beth Hartman|Jimmy Hunt|Stapleton Kent|Bob Kortman|Lee Miller|Hans Moebus|Richard Neill|Gilda Oliva|Beulah Parkington|Sally Rawlinson|Bob Rich|Jack Richardson|Kasey Rogers|Victor Romito|Jean Ruth|Baker Sichol|Hermine Sterler|Tito Vuolo|Kathryn Wilson|Florence Wix
title: Casado y con dos suegras
